short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Me.Wired drives you through the first steps on popular web apps with nice balloons and popups that magically appear inside the apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To Set up a virtual classroom, order groceries and meals online, have a video chat with your beloved ones, where do we go today?
 
Me.Wired drives you through the first steps on many popular websites and web applications, with nice balloons and other content that magically appear inside the application or site you are using. 

Me.Wired helps you interact with different technologies at the very moment you are using them.
When using a popular web application, if the “Help?” triangle shows up in the bottom left corner of your browser, you can access all  available guides just by clicking on this triangle. Me.Wired is there, waiting to help you. 
 
The Me.Wired extension, which  you install by clicking on “Add to Chrome” above, connects to a secure server to download the interactive guidance content into the page you are visiting.
 
Me.Wired is totally safe: it collects completely anonymous information about usage, in order to provide the service. 
 
The service is provided for free and is sponsored by Newired.
All the content and guides are created by a growing community of volunteers around the world. If you want to contribute, please drop us a message with the subject “Me.Wired – I wanna help” to info@newired.com
